hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "giteePullRequestIid: ${giteePullRequestIid}" echo "giteeAfterCommitSha: ${giteeAfterCommitSha}" echo "giteeRef: ${giteeRef}" git config --global core.compression 0
a=0 flag=0 while [ $a -lt 10 ] do echo $a rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/OM timeout 60 git clone -b ${giteeTargetBranch} "${openGaussOM_Http_Repo_Url}" "${WORKSPACE}/OM" if [[ $? == 0 ]] ; then flag=1 break fi a=`expr $a + 1` done
if [[ $flag == 0 ]] ; then echo "clone code failed!" exit 1 fi
cd ${WORKSPACE}/OM git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree git config remote.origin.url ${openGaussOM_Http_Repo_Url} git fetch --tags --force --progress origin ${giteeRef}:${giteeRef} git checkout -b ${giteeRef} ${giteeRef}
echo "edit in background"
mkdir -p ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/binarylibs cd ${WORKSPACE} rm -rf openGauss-third_party_binarylibs* rm -rf om set +x
if [ $giteeTargetBranch = "2.0.0" ] || [ $giteeTargetBranch = "2.0.1" ]; then echo "user 2.0.0 version 3rd binarylibs" wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:openGauss1%232_3%24@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs-2.0.0.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz elif [ $giteeTargetBranch = "3.0.0" ]; then wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:openGauss1%232_3%24@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs-3.0.0.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz else echo "user latest 3rd binarylibs" wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:openGauss1%232_3%24@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz fi
sh /home/OM/remote_clean.sh
#wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:openGauss1%232_3%24@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz set -x tar -zxf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz
# 打包工程 cd /usr/bin rm -rf python ln -sf python2 python
cd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/build/script chmod +x build_opengauss.sh if [ $giteeTargetBranch = "2.0.0" ]; then sed -i 's/make -sj 8/make -sj20 /g' mpp_package.sh fi #sed -i 's/make install -sj 8/make install -sj 6 /g' mpp_package.sh
cd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss sh build.sh -m release -3rd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs -pkg
# 打包om cd ${WORKSPACE}/OM sh build.sh -3rd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs
# copy om包 cp ${WORKSPACE}/OM/package/*om.tar.gz ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/output/.
# 执行om cd /usr/bin rm -rf python ln -sf python3 python cd /home/OM
#export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr1/gauss_jenkins/jenkins/workspace/om/package/script/gspylib/clib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
pkg_branch="2.1.0" if [ "${giteeTargetBranch}"x == "master"x ]; then pkg_branch="3.0.0" elif [ "${giteeTargetBranch}"x == "3.0.0"x ]; then pkg_branch="3.0.1" elif [ "${giteeTargetBranch}"x == "2.0.0"x ]; then pkg_branch="2.0.4" else echo "expand as you need" fi
echo "pakcage version is: $pkg_branch" # 安装 #sh automated-test.sh /usr1/gauss_jenkins/jenkins/workspace ${giteeTargetBranch} sh automated-test.sh /usr1/gauss_jenkins/jenkins/workspace ${pkg_branch}
#升级(基础包未传入) #sh auto_upgradectl.sh /usr1/gauss_jenkins/jenkins/workspace openGauss-1.0.1-CentOS-64bit.tar.gz sh auto_upgradectl.sh /usr1/gauss_jenkins/jenkins/workspace ${pkg_branch}
if [ -e /home/OM/ssh/known_hosts ] then rm -rf ~/.ssh/* cp /home/OM/ssh/* ~/.ssh/ fi
